# Howard Scipio

|birth_place  = Bridgeport, Connecticut, U.S.
|death_date   =
|death_place  = New Haven, Connecticut, U.S.
|party        = Democratic
}}
Howard Scipio (December 2, 1921 â€“ April 30, 2001) was an American politician who served in the Connecticut House of Representatives from the 93rd district from 1993 until his death in 2001.
Scipio died of leukemia on April 30, 2001, in New Haven, Connecticut at the age of 79.
